channel.title: Making a prestieg system in game
channel.description: how do i make it that when u are donator = 1 you are max lvl +1 meaning lvl 127

item.title: Making a prestieg system in game
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

change it via the combat handler in i believe it was “player.java”
and search for: public void getCombat() now this is the code you have to work with: combatLevel = (int)(((double)(k + i1) + Math.floor(j1 / 2)) * 0.25D) + 1; I believe you are to make it so if(donator == 1){ that code will change to combatLevel = (int)(((double)(k + i1) + Math.floor(j1 / 2)) * 0.25D) + 2;

If you cant use what i sent you then give up now.

Read full topic
item.source: Making a prestieg system in game
